headline: MBA Stanford | Co-Founder at Strive Math (YC S21)
summary:
I guess I should have known all along that I love education. What a nerd right!? So here it is: I'm finally going to do it as my profession. 

There is a lot to be fixed in education: low teacher salaries, low access to education, education being behind industry, high student suicide rates, high student depression rate and high cost of education... So the question simply remains: "Can I make an impact here?" I've been blessed to have received high quality education throughout my life, so I see it as my responsibility to do my part. 

Feel free to reach out to me if this resonates with you :)

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.description:
Exciting updates coming soon! Visit our website at https://www.strivemath.com to learn more! 

Strive teaches math through code. We take a fundamentally different approach to coding and math education by combining the two worlds into 90-minute long classes packed with fun projects brain teasers and real-world math and code applications. Strive exists to make math education more meaningful and applicable to the real world. To equip students with the tools they need to lead meaningful and happy lives.

A premier specialized recruiting company for the blockchain industry. BlockHire connects the most elite blockchain professionals with the only most disruptive Blockchain companies.

experiences.title: Summer Accelerator Portfolio Company Co-Founder
experiences.description: Built a tool that let non technical users build an internal company tool (e.g. employee feedback, dashboards, AI tagging...) using a drag and drop user interface.

experiences.title: Implementation Manager
experiences.description:
The Punchh platform drives customer engagement through our industry leading loyalty suite. This includes traditional programs such as visit-based, point-based, and tiered membership, as well as Surprise & Delight, Sweepstakes/Gaming, and Targeted Offers.

We have ~10 people in the US and a 70+ people dev team in India. Our Client List boasts more than 50+ brands with new ones being added faster than ever! Check us out at punchh.com

My role is to work with our clients to customize our extensive solution set to their needs. This ranges from Requirements Gathering, to working with the Developer Team to ensure timely delivery of necessary features. One of the major aspects of the role is to streamline the Implementation Process and increase implementation efficiency by 2 fold.

experiences.title: Consulting - Associate
experiences.description:
• Created a business case for a Fortune 100 IT client to move to the cloud
• Organized and led an ERP selection process for an Entertainment Client
• Represented PwC in Sweden and Collaborated with 6 companies to select the ideal ERP Vendor
• Mapped end to end booking process for a large Casino in Vegas, and suggested automation methodologies
• Spearheaded the formation of a new PwC Competency specialized in Vendor Selection

experiences.title: Future Planning Intern
experiences.description:

• Coded and implemented a java tool to identify new potential research projects at three partner Universities, condensing weeks of work into a few minutes
• Centralized the departments outreach contacts by synchronizing it with the cloud
